wiki.content: The second best hit and the best selling single by a woman of all time! I Will Always Love You was the lead single of The Bodyguard: The Original Soundtrack. Considered one of the most beautiful love songs of all time, it peaked at number #1 in several countries (included United States Of America, United Kingdom and Japan) and in Billboard's Hot 100 stayed for 14 consecutive weeks on #1 and turned to be the greatest hit of the chart and today it's the second song with more weeks at #1 (drawn with We Belong Together by Mariah Carey) and it was passed by One Sweet Day by Mariah Carey which stayed at #1 for 16 consecutive weeks! The single contains songs which haven't come in a album by her: Do You Hear What I Hear? and Moment Of Truth. Originally performed by Dolly Parton. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
